df_sys_email_template.name: User Invite
df_sys_email_template.description: Email sent to invite new users to your DSP.
df_sys_email_template.subject: Invitation
df_sys_email_template.body_html:
Hi {first_name},
You have been invited to check out {dsp.name} at {dsp.host_url}.

Thanks,
{from_name}

df_sys_email_template.name: Registration Confirmation
df_sys_email_template.description: Email sent to new users to complete registration.
df_sys_email_template.subject: Registration Confirmation
df_sys_email_template.body_html:
Hi {first_name},
You have registered to become a {dsp.name} user. Go to the following url, enter the code below, and set your password to confirm your account.

{dsp.host_url}/public/launchpad/confirm_reg.html

Confirmation Code: {confirm_code}

Thanks,
{from_name}

df_sys_email_template.name: Password Reset
df_sys_email_template.description: Email sent to users following a request to reset their password.
df_sys_email_template.subject: Password Reset
df_sys_email_template.body_html:
Hi {first_name},

You have requested to reset your password. Go to the following url, enter the code below, and set your new password.

{dsp.host_url}/public/launchpad/confirm_reset.html

Confirmation Code: {confirm_code}

Thanks,
{from_name}
